text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ¡Oh-hoho! Debo decir que lo hice<n>fabulosamente bien hoy, ¿no crees?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Con mi elegancia, abrir erizos de mar<n>con las manos desnudas es una nimiedad!<n>¡Oh-hohoho!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You showed superb technique on the<n>track today,
Golshi.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sup, Flash! And thanks! You were pretty<n>
shipshape yourself!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Even the beastly great white shark<n>would've
chickened out after seeing you!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Th-thank you... By the way, as promised,<n>I have
something for you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Aquí. Por favor, tómalo.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
This is... a piece of paper with "UM"<n>written on it.
What does it mean?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Apologies. I am not at liberty to<n>elaborate. Now,
if you'll excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Seriously? She's just gonna run off after<n>that?
"UM"? That's about how I feel<n>right now. What
even is this?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The paper Gold Ship received from<n>Eishin Flash
last time mentioned a<n>four-part puzzle to solve.
choice_data_list:
Maybe it's part of the puzzle for Eden's
location?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
...Oh yeah! The Eden puzzle thing! That<n>totally
slipped my mind!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So basically, it's like: run in races, get<n>clues, do
somethin' else, profit!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I like the sound of that. It seems fun! All<n>right, I'm
gonna do my best to get all<n>four clues!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Afterwards, Gold Ship and I eat lunch in<n>the
cafeteria. I'm mid-bite, when...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Fun fact time! Do you know how many<n>seeds are
on a strawberry?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The answer is... somewhere between 100<n>and
500.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of, I'm really in the mood for<n>
strawberries today! ♪ Hang on, I'm<n>gonna go nab
a strawberry mille-feuille<n>before they run out!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ¡Genial! ¡Queda uno! ¡Buen timing,<n>yo!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh! There's still one left! Today must be<n>my lucky
day! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship and Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Huh?
Hm?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me you're planning to steal my<n>precious
pastry?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me? That's totally my line. Like,<n>get out of
my way.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
No way, Jose! I'm not letting you have it,<n>not on
my pride!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You know what? Looking back, you've<n>always
been doing stuff like this to me.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Like that time you argued with me about<n>the
perfect temperature for hot milk, or<n>that other
time about the correct angle<n>to wear a beret.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You even fought me on the number of<n>bumps on
a bitter melon and how spicy<n>chicken wing sauce
should be.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I straight up don't remember any of that<n>
happening. Like, ever.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Parece que nuestras estrellas están<n>destinadas a
chocar siempre...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Well, enough skirting around our fate<n>with these
petty scuffles! If we must<n>fight, then it shall be a
battle for the<n>ages!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
¡Vamos a resolver esto en la pista de<n>carreras,
Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: ¿Qué? ¿Vamos a correr?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I never can tell what's going throughyour head. You're gonna drive mecrazy...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But you know what? Fine. If you're<n>gonna get in
my face, I'll make you<n>seriously regret it. For real.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, you're "for real" now, huh? All<n>right, give
me your best shot!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Para que lo sepas, no hay manera de<n>que pierda
contigo!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ¡Lo mismo digo! ¡Prepárate para conocer<n>tu perdición!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't even look away for one minute<n>without
things going sideways...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Still, it's good to see Gold Ship sharing a<n>heated
rivalry. I'll do what I can to<n>support her.
